text: Hi, I'm Elitsa. Just got hired at a place that uses HubSpot and I'm currently tackling some of the courses in the Learning Center. Looking forward to talking to you all!
Hi, I'm Francesco Bianco from Klood from Milton Keynes, we are proud to use HubSpot for our customers, and to grow with them and you
Hi all, I'm Stefan, a front-end developer from Knoxville, TN, USA. We're looking into taking on some HubSpot projects at my work, so I'm looking forward to getting in touch with you all!
